ORGAN-I.description: Epistemological frameworks, recursive engines, ontological systems, conceptual research
ORGAN-I.portfolio_angle: Demonstrates intellectual depth and foundational thinking. Evidences systemic theory applied to autonomous creative systems.

ORGAN-II.description: Generative art, interactive systems, performance frameworks, experiential work
ORGAN-II.profile_tagline: Generative art and interactive creative systems
ORGAN-II.portfolio_angle: Demonstrates creative systems design and artistic infrastructure. Evidence of producing work using autonomous systems.

ORGAN-III.description: Revenue-generating products, deployed systems, customer-facing tools, B2B/B2C applications
ORGAN-III.profile_tagline: Products and deployed systems for real-world impact
ORGAN-III.portfolio_angle: Demonstrates product-market thinking, sustained revenue generation, and ability to package systems for external users. Evidence of real-world impact.

ORGAN-IV.description: Cross-organ routing, governance, promotion automation, system coordination, dependency management
ORGAN-IV.profile_tagline: Governance and orchestration across the eight-organ system
ORGAN-IV.portfolio_angle: CRITICAL DIFFERENTIATOR. Demonstrates systems architecture, governance design, and organizational capacity to coordinate complex multi-system infrastructure.

ORGAN-V.description: Essays, marginalia, process documentation, building in public, RSS/newsletter, audience engagement
ORGAN-V.profile_tagline: Building in public — essays, process, and thought leadership
ORGAN-V.portfolio_angle: PRIMARY AMPLIFICATION LAYER. Converts meta-system documentation into thought leadership and audience engagement.

ORGAN-VI.description: Community infrastructure, member management, governance, forums, shared resources, collaborative spaces
ORGAN-VI.portfolio_angle: Evidence of building collaborative infrastructure. Demonstrates community contribution model.

ORGAN-VII.description: Content distribution, social amplification, audience building, POSSE automation, release coordination
ORGAN-VII.profile_tagline: Content distribution and audience building via POSSE
ORGAN-VII.portfolio_angle: Demonstrates audience building and content strategy. Evidence of thought leadership positioning.

meta_org.name: meta-${ORGAN_PREFIX}
meta_org.description: The eight-organ creative-institutional system — theory, art, commerce, orchestration, public process, community, marketing, and meta coordinated as a single portfolio.
meta_org.profile_tagline: Eight organs. One system. Creative infrastructure at institutional scale.

naming_convention.note: Double-dash separates type from name in repo naming
